name: Loki

abilities.name: Illusion Decoy
abilities.details: Creates an illusionary duplicate that mimics movement. May explode for minor damage when destroyed or expired.

abilities.name: Trickster's Teleport
abilities.details: Short-range teleport, possibly leaving behind a very brief illusion.

ultimate.name: God of Mischief
ultimate.effect: Applies a random potent debuff (e.g., Polymorph into animal, Reverse Controls, Forced Movement) for ~4 seconds.
ultimate.details: Unleashes powerful, disorienting illusion magic on target(s).

passives.name: Master of Illusions
passives.details: When Loki takes damage, he briefly becomes invisible (Short cooldown on this effect).

teamups.effect: Illusion Decoy duration increased when near specified allies.

lore: The Asgardian God of Mischief, adopted brother of Thor. Loki is a master of sorcery, illusion, and deceit, constantly scheming and shifting allegiances.
